fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- All Rugby roles are unique.
- Only up to seven members may spawn. In a game with less than 22 players, only 4 will spawn.
- If less than seven members would spawn, the first 3 members are Forwards, and any additional members are Backs.
- Factional chat
- No factional kill
- At the start of the game, one member gets the Ball.
- While a Rugby Member has the Ball, they have Powerful defense and their ability is replaced with "Choose two targets. You deal a basic attack to the first target. If you kill the target, you kick the ball into the second target, attacking them. If your second target is a Rugby player, you pass the ball to them instead."
- Whenever the Ball carrier is attacked, a random attacker gets the Ball.
- If no member has the Ball, whenever one or more members visits a player with the Ball, a random one of those members gets the Ball. This has priority over non-Rugby players attempting to get the ball.

fields.name: Features (cont.):
fields.value: - If the Rugby faction does not have the ball in possession, Rugby members will all be able to visit a player without using an ability.
